blogPost.excerpt: Live stock prices right in your macOS Dock. Updates every minute. Start with: AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, more coming soon
blogPost.body: Live stock prices right in your macOS Dock. Updates every minute. Start with: AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, more coming soon
blogPost.title: StockDock - Live stock prices right in your macOS Dock
blogPost.author: Andreas Storm

localize.description: 实时股票价格就在你的macOS Dock中。每分钟更新一次。从以下几个方面开始。AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, 更多内容即将推出。
localize.tagline: 实时股票价格就在您的macOS Dock中。

localize.description: 實時股票價格就在你的macOS Dock中。每分鐘更新一次。從以下幾個方面開始。AAPL, AMC, AMZN, FB, GC=F, GME, GOOG, NKE, MSFT, NFLIX, TSLA, TWTR, 更多內容即將推出。
localize.tagline: 實時股票價格就在您的macOS Dock中。

previous.excerpt: https://burnrate.fyi is a SaaS expense estimator designed with ease-of-use in mind. In three easy steps you can choose the products or services you want, configure them, and see your expected burnrate at the end of each month.
previous.title: burnrate.fyi - Estimate your SaaS expenses in 5 minutes for free

localize.description: https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS费用估算器，设计时考虑到了易用性。在三个简单的步骤中，你可以选择你想要的产品或服务，配置它们，并在每个月末看到你的预期燃烧率。
https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS費用估算器，設計時考慮到了易用性。在三個簡單的步驟中，你可以選擇你想要的產品或服務，配置它們，並在每個月末看到你的預期燃燒率。

next.excerpt: Charge Running is a mobile app that provides live running classes with others from all over the world! Trainers will update you on your stats and interact with you and your fellow runners in our real-time chat room.
next.title: Charge Running - Social running app with real-time coaching

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手机应用，它提供了与来自世界各地的其他人的实时跑步课程! 培训师会在我们的实时聊天室里更新你的数据，并与你和你的跑友互动。
localize.tagline: 实时指导的社交跑步应用

localize.description: Charge Running是一款手機應用，它提供了與來自世界各地的其他人的實時跑步課程! 培訓師會在我們的實時聊天室裏更新你的數據，並與你和你的跑友互動。
localize.tagline: 實時指導的社交跑步應用
